name: Seed Yeet
description:
SEED YEET

YEET 2 THE SUN!

Fling your seed using your catapult-branch to gather water and grow bigger trees. Eventually you'll have a tree big enough you can YEET TO THE SUN!

Watch out for fire traps, they are not friendly to little seedlings.

Bounce off of rocks and land on different platforms while collecting water from clouds.

Controls:

* HOLD Spacebar to build yeet

* RELEASE Spacebar to yeet seeds

* HOLD Shift for "Precision Yeeting" while winding up

All code, art, and sounds lovingly crafted over a week for Brackeys Game Jam 2023-1:
"An end is a new beginning"

Background music sourced by Seth_Makes_Sounds on freesound.org
https://freesound.org/people/Seth_Makes_Sounds/sounds/674939/
